name: Murder of Crows Test Demo
description:
Murder of Crows is the first of many projects I'm planning to make. Currently, only a short demo of it is available. However, depending on how the demo is received, I may end up making it a full short game.

This is my first time making a game ever, so all sorts of feedback is welcome!

The game follows the Life and Times of an Unfortunate Assassin. You were at  your friend Stitchy's party when the Crow Clan arrived, tearing your friend to bits without hesitation or following up on their RSVP beforehand. Now it's up to you to travel the lands, collecting pieces of your old friend to put him back together again as well as taking down the Crow Clan throughout your Journey. 

So get out there and KICK SOME CROW!

(You cannot kill the boss in this version. Some assets are reskins of Nuclear Throne Enemies, however, this won't be the case if the game gets enough support for an Official release. The Boss is using The Oasis Boss sprite and YOU CURRENTLY CANNOT KILL THE BOSS. Just avoid it and try to rack up a high score <3 )

CONTROLS

A =  Move left

D = Move right

W = Jump

Left Mouse Button = Shoot

R = Restart

Make sure to post your highscore and proof via screenshot with your feedback/review/comment. 

Scores will be compared between other players and Those with the higher amount of points are eligible for a reward.

Take care and stay safe, I hope you enjoy the Demo!

-Grim
